text: Santo André (Portuguese and Galician for Saint Andrew) may refer to the following: ==Places== * Brazil: **Santo André, Paraíba, a city in Brazil **Santo André, São Paulo, a city in Brazil * Portugal: **Santo André, Póvoa de Varzim, a fishing district of the city of Póvoa de Varzim, Portugal **Cape Santo André, a cape in Portugal *Santo André de Teixido, a pilgrimage sanctuary in Cedeira, Galicia, Spain ==Other== *Esporte Clube Santo André, a Brazilian football (soccer) team *Santo André (ship), a museum ship in Ílhavo, Portugal
title: Santo André (disambiguation)
